TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Taimali, title = Taimali, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taimali} }

S.FORM: Taimali mki sku Taitung. su'unun kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 102.29 km² (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 4.53 km², rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 57.38 km²), 7,128 hi ku su'unun kwara alang hi kya, 2,979 buwan ku kwarakya, tiku sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga 4,782 hi, kyala kwara pinspung s'uli ga 67%. kwara sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga Taywang Gyencumin na Paywan, Amis ku smrrhu ku pyux s'uli taya kya. ays ptyaw sebu Taimali ays psgayun 9 ru 13 alang. 13 alang hani ga, Lupakatj , Tjavualji , Kiring , Tjatjigel , Anasolay , Davugele , Takidis , Padrangigrang , Calavi , Kanadun , Sasaljak , Lalauran , Cilalongay .

Taimali mki sko Taitong. so'onon kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 102.29 km² (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 4.53 km², rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 57.38 km²), 7,128 hi ko so'onon kwara alang hi kya, 2,979 bowan ko kwarakya, tiko sahoy na alang Gyencomin ga 4,782 hi, kyala kwara pinspong s'oli ga 67%. kwara sahoy na alang Gyencomin ga Taywang Gyencomin na Paywan, Amis ko smrrho ko pyox s'oli taya kya. ays ptyaw sebo Taimali ays psgayon 9 ro 13 alang. 13 alang hani ga, Lopakatj , Tjavoalji , Kiring , Tjatjigel , Anasolay , Davogele , Takidis , Padrangigrang , Calavi , Kanadon , Sasaljak , Lalaoran , Cilalongay .
